mapper.select: select a.*, b.orderDate, b.orderPrice, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where a.memberName=#{memberName} order by a.itemUploadDate desc

select a.*, b.orderDate, b.orderPrice, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where a.memberName=#{memberName} and trunc(a.itemUploadDate) BETWEEN trunc(sysdate-7) and trunc(sysdate) order by a.itemUploadDate desc

select a.*, b.orderDate, b.orderPrice, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where a.memberName=#{memberName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and trunc(a.itemUploadDate) BETWEEN trunc(sysdate-30) and trunc(sysdate) order by a.itemUploadDate desc

select a.*, b.orderDate, b.orderPrice, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where a.memberName=#{memberName} and trunc(a.itemUploadDate) BETWEEN trunc(sysdate-180) and trunc(sysdate) order by a.itemUploadDate desc
select b.* from saparewantitem a inner join sapareitem b on b.itemId=a.itemId where a.memberName=#{memberName} order by b.itemId desc
select b.* from saparewantitem a inner join sapareitem b on b.itemId=a.itemId where a.memberName=#{memberName} order by b.itemwantcnt desc
select b.* from saparewantitem a inner join sapareitem b on b.itemId=a.itemId where a.memberName=#{memberName} order by b.itemPrice asc

select a.*, b.orderDate, b.orderPrice, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where a.memberName=#{memberName} and a.itemStatus = 'y' order by a.itemId desc

select a.*, b.orderDate, b.orderPrice, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where a.memberName=#{memberName} and a.itemStatus = 'n' order by a.itemId desc
